extendedInfo.description: Please note, this app covers last year's season 2011/12. We will be updating it shortly for the current season.Get live match updates for the all the games with Gloucester Rugby 2011/12, the most comprehensive App to follow Gloucester in the Aviva and the Amlin Challenge Cup. Live scores, squads, stats, fixtures, and the tables for the Aviva Premiership and the Amlin Cup.As well as everything you will need about club rugby, there is a wealth of information about historic data from the European Rugby scene, from competition information to a searchable database of over 6,500 club competition fixtures, and info on all venues is included.Features include: â Live Match ResultsLive match results for games in the Aviva Premiership and the Amlin Cup â Match day squadsFull match day squads for the big games â Match StatsComprehensive stats on the match available shortly after the last whistle is blown including passes made/missed, line outs won/lost, scrums, yellow cards etcâ Match timelinesWhere available, key timelines of the matchâ FixturesFull list of fixtures for all competitions.â Match TimesMatch times are localised to where you areâ Player ProfilesFull profile of each registered player â TablesTables for the all the competitions updated live after every game playedâ NewsAll the news that you will need. Live News feed from all the competitions and teams where available.â Head to HeadSearch over 6,500 European Club Rugby games. You can search head to head, or via competition, result, season or opponent. Also points for and against is availableâ Team PlacementYou will be able to check where the Gloucester team and all other teams have been officially placed in previous competitions â  Aviva Premiership and Amlin Cupâ Previous Competition ProfilesFull wiki profiles of what happened in all previous competitions each year. â VenuesFull profiles of all the key rugby venues in the worldAnd much moreâ¦â¦â¦. This App will give you all the information that you need in your pocket Check out our other apps: Search for âSporting Oracleâ in the App Store â Rugby 2011/12 (covers all the top 20 teams in the world)â Club Rugby 2011/12 (covers all key European Competitions)â Rabo 2011/12â H Cup 2011/12â Rugby 2011 NZ World Cup Liveâ 101 Rugby Greatsâ 101 Rugby TriviaIf you experience any problems with our apps or would like to suggest an improvement, please email Scrum@SportingOracle.com, thanks. These apps are developed for rugby fans by rugby fans, so the more feedback we can get the better we can make them!!Please note: This application is not affiliated with the official organisers of the tournament or their sponsors or the teams involved.Please note: For some of the features you will need 3G or wireless connection
